name: Stars are Falling (DEMO)
description:
• Chapter 1 (out of 2?)
  • Fluffy bonding with extraterrestrial boys
  • A lot of YELLING
  • One True Ending (to be continued...)
  • Bonus content unlocked after finishing the main story!

・。・゜★・。・。☆・゜・。・゜。・。・゜★・。・。☆

*Note: This game is entirely fictional and (unfortunately) doesn't apply normal science. You could say that this game is... out of this world.*

We would like to know how you feel about the game after playing it! Feel free to let us know in the comments below or take this google survey:

https://tinylink.net/8FaO7

Likewise, if there are any bugs or grammar errors encountered during the game, please let us know as well!

・。・゜★・。・。☆・゜・。・゜。・。・゜★・。・。☆

Stars are Falling is in-development with only one chapter available as a demo. It's on hold for now but we project it to be finished somewhere in 2019. We'd really appreciate if you still give it a try!

Thanks for checking out our game! ～☆


Special Thanks and Credit to Peritune, http://peritune.com/ 
for their wonderful music!
